dr.inference.mcmc
Class MCMC

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.mcmc.MCMC
All Implemented Interfaces:
Identifiable, Spawnable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
public class MCMC
extends java.lang.Object
implements Identifiable, Spawnable

An MCMC analysis that estimates parameters of a probabilistic model.

Version:
$Id: MCMC.java,v 1.41 2005/07/11 14:06:25 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Alexei Drummond, Andrew Rambaut

init

public void init(MCMCOptions options,
                 Likelihood likelihood,
                 OperatorSchedule schedule,
                 Logger[] loggers)
Must be called before calling chain.

Parameters:
options - the options for this MCMC analysis
schedule - operator schedule to be used in chain.
likelihood - the likelihood for this MCMC
loggers - an array of loggers to record output of this MCMC run

init

public void init(MCMCOptions options,
                 Likelihood likelihood,
                 OperatorSchedule schedule,
                 Logger[] loggers,
                 MarkovChainDelegate[] delegates)
Must be called before calling chain.

Parameters:
options - the options for this MCMC analysis
schedule - operator schedule to be used in chain.
likelihood - the likelihood for this MCMC
loggers - an array of loggers to record output of this MCMC run
delegates - an array of delegates to handle tasks related to the MCMC

init

                 Likelihood likelihood,
                 Prior prior,
                 OperatorSchedule schedule,
                 Logger[] loggers)
Must be called before calling chain.

Parameters:
options - the options for this MCMC analysis
prior - the prior disitrbution on the model parameters.
schedule - operator schedule to be used in chain.
likelihood - the likelihood for this MCMC
loggers - an array of loggers to record output of this MCMC run

init

public void init(int chainlength,
                 Likelihood likelihood,
                 MCMCOperator[] operators,
                 Logger[] loggers)
Must be called before calling chain.

Parameters:
chainlength - chain length
likelihood - the likelihood for this MCMC
operators - an array of MCMC operators
loggers - an array of loggers to record output of this MCMC run
